sentences.en: A suppressed immune system puts a transplant recipient at risk of other infections.
sentences.cn: 接受器官移植的病人免疫系统受到抑制后很可能会感染其他疾病。

sentences.en: Farmers will be able to seed it directly, rather than having to transplant seedlings.
sentences.cn: 农民将能够直接播种，而不用移种秧苗。

sentences.en: Harefield Hospital has become world-famous for its pioneering heart transplant surgery.
sentences.cn: 哈瑞福德医院以其开创性的心脏移植手术闻名于世。

sentences.en: He was recovering from a heart transplant operation.
sentences.cn: 他做了心脏移植手术，正在康复。

sentences.en: I have to transplant the begonias.
It is possible to transplant chromosomes in cell nuclei.
sentences.cn: 移植细胞核内的染色体是可能的.

sentences.en: It was feared his body was rejecting a kidney he received in a transplant four years ago.
sentences.cn: 令人担心的是，他的身体可能对4年前移植的肾产生了排斥反应。

sentences.en: Only 12 weeks ago he underwent major heart transplant surgery.
sentences.cn: 12个星期前他才刚刚接受了风险很高的心脏移植手术。

sentences.en: Several of the patients had received kidney transplant.
sentences.cn: 病人中有几位已接受了肾移植手术.

sentences.en: She underwent a heart transplant in a last-ditch attempt to save her.
sentences.cn: 她动了心脏移植手术，这是为挽救她的生命而作的最后一次努力。

sentences.en: She was on a wait list for a liver transplant.
sentences.cn: 她的名字当时在肝移植等候者名单上。

sentences.en: Since her heart and lung transplant operation she has gone from strength to strength.
sentences.cn: 做过心肺移植手术后，她的身体不断好转。

sentences.en: Some plants do not transplant well.
Surgeons have successfully transplanted a liver into a four-year-old boy.
sentences.cn: 外科医生成功地给一个四岁的男孩移植了肝脏。

sentences.en: The operation to transplant a kidney is now fairly routine.
sentences.cn: 移植肾脏的手术如今相当常见。

sentences.en: There are 2,000 children worldwide who need a bone marrow transplant.
sentences.cn: 全世界有2,000名儿童需要骨髓移植。

sentences.en: They transplant tendinous tissue to enable the crippled to walk.
sentences.cn: 他们通过移植腱组织使跛足的人能行走。

words.tran_cn: [林]移植；移植器官；被移植物；移居者

phrases.tran_cn: 心脏移植；心脏移植手术

trans.tran_cn: （器官、皮肤、头发等的）移植，移植物，移植者
trans.tran_en: the operation of transplanting an organ, piece of skin etc

trans.tran_cn: 移植，移种；人工移植(心,胃)；迁移 "
trans.tran_en: to move an organ, piece of skin etc from one person’s body and put it into another as a form of medical treatment

trans.tran_cn: 移植（器官、皮肤等）；移植，移种（植物）
trans.tran_en: to move an organ, piece of skin etc from one person’s body and put it into another as a form of medical treatment

trans.tran_cn: 移植，移种，移民，迁移，移植（器官、皮肤、头发等）
trans.tran_en: to move an organ, piece of skin etc from one person’s body and put it into another as a form of medical treatment
